known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: Audit Alertmanager API access controls; implement authentication proxy or K8s NetworkPolicy to restrict API access to authorized pods only

known_data_gaps.gap_description: Alertmanager gossip protocol between cluster members may use unencrypted traffic; webhook notification credentials (PagerDuty keys, Slack tokens) stored in K8s Secrets
known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: Verify Alertmanager cluster gossip TLS configuration; audit K8s Secret encryption for notification channel credentials

name: HashiCorp Vault Enterprise (Secrets Management)
description: Enterprise secrets management platform deployed across Genestack Kubernetes clusters and internal DevOps pipelines. Manages TLS certificates, API keys, database credentials, and PKI infrastructure. Integrated with Kubernetes via Vault Agent Injector and CSI driver. Used as secrets backend for OpenStack-Helm charts in Genestack deployment. Also serves as certificate authority for internal mTLS service mesh.

encryption_profile.data_at_rest: AES-256-GCM (Vault seal/unseal with auto-unseal via Transit or cloud KMS)
encryption_profile.data_in_transit: TLS 1.3 (API), mTLS (cluster replication)
encryption_profile.key_management: Internal barrier keyring + external auto-unseal (Transit, AWS KMS, or Azure Key Vault)

availability_design.redundancy_level: Raft HA with 3-5 node consensus

observability_stack.alerting_coverage: Seal status, leader changes, token expiry, audit failures

support_model.escalation_path: HashiCorp Support Portal → TAM → Engineering

business_impact_if_unavailable.impact_description: Complete halt of secrets rotation, certificate issuance, and credential vending for all Genestack services and DevOps pipelines. No new deployments possible. Existing services degrade as secrets/certs expire.

access_control_model: Policy-based ACL (HCL policies) + Sentinel EGP/RGP (Enterprise)

temporal.change_reason: Attribute enrichment — CDAIO KG program

provenance.primary_data_source: HashiCorp Vault Helm chart referenced in Rackspace Genestack documentation at rackerlabs/genestack on GitHub

known_data_gaps.gap_description: Vault Raft snapshot backup frequency, tested restore dates, and DR replication configuration not confirmed. For the root of trust, backup/DR is existential.
known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: Validate Raft snapshot schedule, test full restore to isolated cluster, confirm DR replication topology and RPO/RTO targets

known_data_gaps.gap_description: No security architecture review on record for the platform that manages ALL secrets, PKI, and credentials. Seal/unseal configuration, auto-unseal trust chain, and policy audit not validated.
known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: Commission security architecture review covering seal mechanism, auto-unseal trust chain, namespace isolation, policy-as-code audit, and Sentinel governance rules

name: PagerDuty Operations Cloud (Incident Alerting)
description: SaaS-based incident alerting and on-call management platform. Routes alerts from Prometheus AlertManager, Splunk SIEM, Datadog, and ServiceNow to on-call Rackers. Manages on-call schedules for 24x7x365 NOC and SOC operations across global teams. Integrated with Slack for incident channel automation and ServiceNow for ticket creation. Critical for Fanatical Experience SLA management.

encryption_profile.data_in_transit: TLS 1.2+ for all API and webhook communications

access_control_model: PagerDuty team-based RBAC; escalation policy-scoped access; API key management for integration endpoints

Provides remote state management, Sentinel policy enforcement, and audit logs for IaC deployments across AWS, Azure, GCP, and OpenStack. Distinct from the on-premises Terraform Enterprise instance (sys-088).
